content.text: Kattada was a planet on the Commenor Run in the Colonies.
The planet was a terrestrial planet with a tropical climate. It was well known for its beautiful beaches. The city of Haleoda was the capital and the planet's main spaceport.
Kattada joined the Galactic Republic prior to the Indecta Era. During the Alsakan Conflicts, it supported Alsakan.

Prior to 0 BBY, the planet was ruled by Mia Ikova, a Rebel sympathizer. It was the site of the Battle of Kattada, which was a battle fought between Imperial and Rebellion forces led by Princess Leia Organa.

elements.text: Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope radio drama
